body.name: COOFANDY Men's Dress Shirts Short Sleeve Regular Fit Wrinkle Free Business Textured Shirt Casual Button Down Shirts
features: Fur description Men's Business Dress Shirts

【Wrinkle-Free Fabric】COOFANDY Mens Dress Shirt made of lightweight, durable soft breathable fabric. With the perfect mix of comfort, style and fit, our mens shirts will make you stand out from the crowd.

【Classic Design】This classic dress shirt is featured with spread collar, short sleeves and button closure, gives you a capable and sophisticated look. A textured geometric pattern elevates this basic dress shirt to keep you looking smart all day.
【REGULAR FIT】COOFANDY business button down shirts are tailored in a regular fit style, ensuring a comfortable and stylish fit for a wide range of body types.

【Multiple Occasions】The short sleeve dress shirts are suitable for formal occasions or daily casual, such as office, meetings, weddings, Date, dinner, parties. Also can be used as suit shirt or tuxedo shirt.
【Warm Tips】US size. Machine washable. Please refer to our size chart to ensure you select the correct size. If you have any questions about our dress shirts, don't hesitate to contact us.

It combines classic elements with contemporary trends, aiming for a design style that is both minimalistic and yet full of personality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought a bunch of this for my husband; he loves them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and stylish if you like the fabric
reviews.reviewText: I recently picked up a COOFANDY Dress Shirt and was immediately impressed by the fit and the style. The fit is right, which is rare for me. Hangs right, not too snug, and wrinkle-free. The shirt feels soft against the skin, though a tad synthetic for my taste, but it's something I can overlook given its overall comfort and style. I opted for the dark blue, which works well both at the office and for casual wear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort, Style, and a Perfect Fit
reviews.reviewText: I recently added the COOFANDY Men's Dress Shirt to my wardrobe, and it has quickly become a favorite for its winning combination of comfort, style, and an impeccable fit. This short sleeve dress shirt seamlessly blends business attire with a casual button-down design. Here's why I find this shirt to be a standout choice:Exceptional Comfort:The COOFANDY Men's Dress Shirt prioritizes comfort without compromising on style. The fabric is soft against the skin, allowing for a comfortable wearing experience throughout the day. Whether worn during business meetings or casual outings, the shirt's comfort remains consistent.Stylish and Versatile Design:This shirt effortlessly balances a business-casual aesthetic, making it a versatile piece for various occasions. The short sleeve design adds a modern touch, making it suitable for warmer weather or when you want a more laid-back look. The classic button-down style ensures a polished appearance.Wrinkle-Free Fabric:One notable feature of this dress shirt is its wrinkle-free fabric. The shirt maintains a crisp and polished look even after extended wear, minimizing the need for constant ironing. This is especially convenient for individuals with a busy lifestyle who appreciate a sharp and professional appearance.Regular Fit Tailoring:The regular fit tailoring of the COOFANDY shirt strikes the perfect balance between a streamlined silhouette and room for comfortable movement. The shirt complements various body types, ensuring a flattering look for individuals who prefer a classic fit.True-to-Size Fit:I found that the shirt fits true to size, adhering to standard sizing expectations. This accurate sizing information simplifies the online shopping experience, allowing customers to confidently select their usual size with the assurance that it will provide the desired fit.Durable Construction:The shirt exhibits durable construction, emphasizing quality craftsmanship. The stitching is well-executed, contributing to the shirt's longevity. The attention to detail in the construction adds to the overall value of the product.Easy Care:Maintaining the COOFANDY Men's Dress Shirt is hassle-free. The easy-care instructions ensure that the shirt retains its quality after each wash. The convenience of easy care aligns with modern lifestyles, where time-efficient clothing maintenance is appreciated.Conclusion:In conclusion, the COOFANDY Men's Dress Shirt in a short sleeve design is a winning choice for those seeking a comfortable, stylish, and well-fitted garment. It effortlessly bridges the gap between business and casual attire, making it a versatile addition to any wardrobe.For individuals in search of a dress shirt that combines comfort, style, and a true-to-size fit, the COOFANDY Men's Short Sleeve Dress Shirt is a reliable option. Its wrinkle-free fabric and durable construction make it a practical and fashionable choice for both professional and casual settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice shirt, versatile.
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice shirt. It fits well and is true to size. The material is cool and comfortable but feels synthetic. I'm okay with that. The material is wrinkle-free which is great. I look and feel as fresh at the end of day as I do at the start. The stitching is very good and the shirt is long, which I like because I usually wear my shirts untucked and often, shirts are a little short.The design - the collar, the fit - all make for a shirt that can be worn to work but can also be worn for casual events. I like this shirt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Material Isn't My Cup O' Tea
reviews.reviewText: Firstly, this isn't a terrible shirt, but I do have some nitpicks. The sizing was a LITTLE snug for me, but that's not my main concern. The collar doesn't want to rest for me, so I look like a stereotypical prep kid trying to pop my collar up, it's very stiff, and the material itself is too slick for my tastes. I wanted to like it because it is kind of cooling, but it almost has a rubbery texture to my skin, and just feels a little off. I can't knock it too much, because some people might like this style and this material, so I can't hold that against them, because it's still a nice shirt, just doesn't fit my preferences personally.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The wrinkle-free fabric ensures a polished look throughout the day, while the textured design adds a touch of sophistication. Its regular fit provides comfort without sacrificing style, making it an ideal choice for business settings.PYXS

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Business casual chic.
reviews.reviewText: Very much enjoyed this shirt, especially on business trips or for meetings paired with a blazer or business forward jacket. I have a very athletic build and it contours to that well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A tad long, but bountiful.
reviews.reviewText: I normally don't get a single brand of clothing on a consistent basis, but COOFANDY shirts have hit it out of the park so many times that I can't pass an opportunity to add another to my collection. I normally wear an XXL and the brand stays pretty consistent in sizing. This shirt fits well around me, but is a bit longer the company's usual offerings. I personally don't mind this except it runs lower than a jacket or sport coat (I rarely tuck), leaving it to only be worn without a jacket. All nitpicking aside, I'm sold on this overseas brand and can highly recommend any shirt they offer.
